body.name: Taylor Swoden 12-Cup Programmable Coffee Maker, Regular & Strong Brew Drip Coffee Machine for Home and Office, Glass Carafe, Pause & Serve, Auto Shut Off, Black & Stainless Steel
body.merchantInfo: Sold by TAYLORTECH INC. and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 8 hrs 58 mins
features: 【PROGRAMMABLE COFFEE MAKERS】It features the LCD screen, easily program the coffee to brew time up to 24 hours in advance to brew hot coffee at a specific time
【LARGE 12 CUP CAPACITY】This coffee maker with timer brews up to 12 cups of delicious hot coffee at a time. The anti-drip system enables you to pause and pour mid-brew with mess-free

【BREWING STRENGTH ADJUSTMENT】The brewing strength setting in the coffee machines allows you to choose regular or bold coffee. The exclusive showerhead design evenly saturates coffee grounds, resulting in maximum flavor.The permanent filter works with your favorite coffee grounds and teas like Oolong tea, black tea, white tea

【TWO-HOUR AUTO-SHUTOFF】The nonstick carafe plate keeps coffee warm for up to 40 minutes after brewing is complete. The coffee pot maker automatically turns off after 2 hours for peace of mind. The drip coffee maker is easy to fill and features a large water window that's easy to view

【CLEANING CYCLE REMINDER】You can know when it’s time to clean the compact coffee maker by the flashing green light. 1 YEAR WARRANTY and based customer support team means you can buy with confidence. If you have any questions about the coffeemaker, please do not hesitate to contact our customer service
body.description: Taylor Swoden Programmable Thermal Coffeemaker Discover the coffeemaker that’s as sophisticated as your tastes The Programmable Coffeemaker is a classic item. With its compact design, this coffee maker takes up less space but still makes up to 12 cups. Plus, cleanup is a snap with the removable filter basket and easy-clean control panel.The permanent grounds filter removes the need for messy paper filters. Enjoy homemade coffee anytime! This machine can brew 24 hours in advance. In the morning, there is no need to wait for a cup of delicious coffee. The coffee machine turns off automatically two hours later when the cooking work is completed. You can go to work with no worries.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Taylor Swoden Programmable Thermal Coffeemaker Discover the coffeemaker that’s as sophisticated as your tastes The Programmable Coffeemaker is a classic item. With its compact design, this coffee maker takes up less space but still makes up to 12 cups. Plus, cleanup is a snap with the removable filter basket and easy-clean control panel.The permanent grounds filter removes the need for messy paper filters. Enjoy homemade coffee anytime! This machine can brew 24 hours in advance. In the morning, there is no need to wait for a cup of delicious coffee. The coffee machine turns off automatically two hours later when the cooking work is completed. You can go to work with no worries. Carafe holds up to 12 cups Clear-view window makes it easy to see how much water is in the machine Brew strength selector for brewing Regular or Bold preferred flavor/strength Carafe-side water reservoir with extra-large capacity and measurement markings Control panel and display, program the brewing time up to 24 hours beforehand

Glass Carafe The sturdy 12-servings* carafe has measurement markings for accurate filling and an easy-grip handle for comfortable pouring. *Serving size equals approximately 5 ounces (varies by brewing technique) Anti-drip design Allows for pouring a cup at any time during the brew cycle, and ensures no more messy spills on your counter within 30 seconds. Easy to View Water Window The coffee maker's 60oz water reservoir is easy to fill and include the viewing panel, which reduces overflow by way of added visibility.

Digital Controls The touch-screen control panel with LCD display is clearly visible and is easy to operate. 2 Brew Strength Brew strength control allows you to select regular or bold Coffee flavor. Keep Warm Hot plate stays on for 2 hours and then automatically turns off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice replace for my old upscale coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, makes good coffee in a reasonable time, keeps track of pots to remind me of cleaning. Instructions are very clear. Looks good.Cons - the water fill gauge is easy to see, but not when actually filling the machine. Because of where mine is located, I can actually see through the gauge from inside, at least when nearly full, but some of that is because of my under counter lighting. - There is a lot of plastic. The machine seems sturdy enough, and the machine was very affordable.All in all, a very nice, affordable and capable coffee machine. I would not want a home machine with a reservoir, unless it was a single pot-full. I am the only coffee drinker in the house normally, and only make a full pot every other day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Coffee Pot. Great price..I recommend this one
reviews.reviewText: My coffee tastes better from this maker, it is fast compared to my former one / brews 10 cups in less than 8 minutes. It looks good , is easy to use, programable, and even has a self cleaning setting. It takes less counter space than most like it and was directly shipped by Amazon drivers who somehow gets your packages to you in a flash and delivered with care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice little coffee pot but every time I try to pour a full pot of water into it I spill water all over. Have to do half pot at a time. It works great otherwise and easy to program and set time! Worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast, Efficient, Ease of Use. Makes Great Coffee
reviews.reviewText: Once the time is set and the start time is programmed, it's so convenient to set up at night for the morning automated perk time. Past coffee pots like this were difficult to remove the coffee basket without burning your fingers. This one allows easy removal of the used coffee basket without burning your fingers. Setting the start time the night before is also easy. The coffee perk time is quite good. Great value for the money. Unless you're looking for something ultra fancy and expensive, this is it. A very good coffee pot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The product does what it's supposed to. However, these things I don't like:* Water container is blocked by the sprayer in the middle, making it hard to pour water into receptacle without spilling or needing a funnel.* Somehow coffee grounds get all over the filter holder at top edge.* Most irritating is the pot itself refuses to pour without a portion of your coffee running down the side of the mug. Mess everytime. I somewhat remedy this with a knife or straw at the pour spot to guide water.In general, this is yet another cheap plastic product. Rather than using a reliable durable metal, we get plastic. This seems to be unavoidable without making your own coffee maker unfortunately. I did not have these problems with the Mr Coffee maker. However, I had to scrap the working Mr Coffee maker because I couldn't find a compatible decanter. Amazon sold me one that was too short which then allowed the flow to continue when the pot was removed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and functional
reviews.reviewText: This coffee maker is very nice. I bought it because the old one died. I put the order in at 8am, and it was delivered at around 5pm. Great move, since my husband is miserable without his morning coffee! Thanks, Amazon ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars its nice size and does the job
reviews.reviewText: I love this coffee maker . not hard to use , stays clean has a 2 hr window before nit shuts off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good overall design. Like the low height as it fits underneath our relatively low kitchen cabinets.
reviews.reviewText: I would like to give this a better overall rating, but this is the 2nd purchase of this particular product. I originally purchased one on May 2022 and didn't start using until recently (out of warranty by this time) and unfortunately it stopped working shortly after starting to use it. With that said I reluctantly repurchased one to replace the last one due to the overall height and our low clearance above the counter tops. I hope this one performs better than the original unit we purchased.
